scraped_content.full_text: Deaths in 2025 - Wikipedia Jump to content From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia The following notable deaths occurred in 2025. Names are reported under the date of death, in alphabetical order. A typical entry reports information in the following sequence: Name, age, country of citizenship at birth, subsequent nationality (if applicable), what subject was noted for, cause of death (if known), and a reference.
